net.munki.irc.handlers.script

Class IRCScriptResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.munki.irc.handlers.script.IRCScriptResource

  • public class IRCScriptResource
extends java.lang.Object
    A resource providing an API to JavaBot scripts.

      Returns the bot's hostmask.

      Returns the bot's nickname.

        Creates new IRCScriptResource
        Parameters:
        env - The bot environment.
        nick - The nickname of the bot.
        mask - The hostmask of the bot.
        addressee - The addressee of the script command.
        arguments - Any arguments to be send to the script.
